name: RC: The Survival
description:
RC: The Survival, is a posterized zombie survival game about a security worker having to break out of his last stance as he has run out of favorite baked beans and cat food. As a RC and explosives nut he jammed together the ultimate RC car that will blow his path to freedom.

  • Team:
    • KuroPSPiso
  • Member(s):
    • Ryan van den Bogaard

    • RC: The Survival
  • Name submission:

  • Assets used that are made before:

      • FirstPersonGunAnimation
      • SkySphere
      • VehicleWheel Classes

    • Blender
    • Unreal Engine 2.23

    • End: Wednesday 06:00AM August 14th (CEST)

All assets are home made during the jam.
